question1.title: What is Clothy and how does it work?
question1.content: Clothy is a platform designed to redesign the future of fashion. Our first feature allows users to find similar clothing based on images through artificial intelligence and web scraping. Our goal is to create an innovative and sustainable environment for all fashion lovers.

question2.title: How can I search for similar clothing using Clothy?
question2.content: Using Clothy is very simple. You just need to upload an image of the garment you are looking for, and our artificial intelligence will search for similar options in real time. This will allow you to find products that fit your personal style quickly and effectively.

question3.title: Does Clothy work with local brands?
question3.content: Yes, at Clothy we believe in supporting local and sustainable brands. Our plan includes integrating local businesses so they can showcase their products and reach a wider audience. In this way, we foster an inclusive and diverse ecosystem in the fashion industry.

question4.title: Is it safe to use Clothy?
question4.content: Absolutely. At Clothy, we prioritize the safety and privacy of our users. Your data and searches are protected and will never be shared with third parties without your consent. Additionally, we follow best security practices in all our operations.

question5.title: What are Clothy's future plans?
question5.content: This is just the beginning. We plan to expand Clothy's features, including a more sustainable search engine, integration with international brands, and tools to help users make more responsible purchasing decisions. We also aim to develop systems that reduce overconsumption in the fashion industry.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Our mission goes beyond style or comfort. At Clothy, we dream of a future where fashion reflects the change we want to see in the world: a more sustainable, inclusive, and connected future. We aim to provide tools to find clothing that not only represents them but also respects the planet.

commitment.title: Committed to Our Users
commitment.description: Our users are at the heart of everything we do. Every feature, decision, and improvement is designed to offer an experience that meets their needs and exceeds expectations. Through your feedback and suggestions, we are committed to evolving and building a platform that truly makes a difference.

future.title: Building the Future Together
future.description: This is just the beginning. Our long-term vision includes projects such as creating a more sustainable fashion search engine, integration with local brands, and tools to help reduce overconsumption in the clothing industry. All with a single goal: to help you find your style while helping the world find its balance.

privacitypolicy.intro: At Clothy, your privacy is our priority. We are committed to protecting your personal data and complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Here’s how we collect, use, and protect your information.

section1.title: 1. What Information We Collect and How We Use It
section1.description: We collect the information necessary to provide and continuously improve our service. This includes:
section1.bullet1: Uploaded images: We use them to find similar garments with our AI. These images are anonymized and deleted after a short period.
section1.bullet2: Technical information: Such as device type, operating system, and usage data to optimize our platform.

section2.title: 2. Legal Basis for Data Processing
section2.description: The legal basis for processing your data is based on:
section2.bullet1: Your explicit consent: When you authorize us to use your images.
section2.bullet2: The necessity of data processing: To provide the service you request.
section2.bullet3: Legitimate interest: To improve the performance of our platform and AI.
section2.note: You can withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us.

section3.title: 3. Your Rights Under GDPR
section3.description: Under the GDPR, you have the right to:
section3.bullet1: Access: Request to see the data we have about you.
section3.bullet2: Rectify: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
section3.bullet3: Delete: Request the deletion of your data.
section3.bullet4: Restrict: Limit how we process your data under certain circumstances.
section3.bullet5: Portability: Receive your data in an electronic format.
section3.note: To exercise any of these rights, email us at support@clothy.com.

section4.title: 4. Privacy for Minors
section4.description: Our service is not intended for children under 13. If you discover that a minor has provided us with data, contact us immediately, and we will take the necessary steps to delete it.

section5.title: 5. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section5.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience on Clothy:
section5.bullet1: Technical cookies: Necessary for the basic functioning of the platform.
section5.bullet2: Analytical cookies: With your consent, to analyze usage and improve our services.
section5.note: You can manage cookies through your browser settings.

section6.title: 6. Changes to the Privacy Policy
section6.description: We reserve the right to update this policy at any time. We will notify you of any significant changes before they become effective.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.description: For questions or inquiries, write to us at support@clothy.com.

termsandconditions.title: TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE OF CLOTHY
termsandconditions.welcome: Welcome to Clothy, the platform that allows you to explore and compare fashion options through advanced web scraping techniques, and which will soon integrate functionalities such as a digital wardrobe and virtual fitting rooms based on artificial intelligence. By accessing and using our services, you expressly and unconditionally accept these Terms and Conditions, as well as any future updates. If you do not agree with any clause, please refrain from using the platform.

section1.title: 1. OBJECTIVE AND SCOPE OF THE SERVICE
section1.content:
1.1 Purpose:
Clothy offers a service that allows you to view, compare, and select fashion products extracted from various websites. The platform is intended for personal and consultation purposes, facilitating the user's decision-making when choosing garments.
1.2 Future Functionalities:
In future updates, Clothy will allow users to:
- Upload images of their own garments to create a personalized digital wardrobe.
- Generate outfits by combining pieces from their personal collection.
- Use a virtual fitting room with artificial intelligence that will realistically display how the garments would look.

section2.title: 2. PROPER USE AND CONDUCT OF THE USER
section2.content:
2.1 Permitted Use:
The Clothy service is intended exclusively for personal and consultation purposes. The use of the platform for illegal, defamatory activities or those that infringe on the rights of third parties, as well as for unauthorized commercial purposes, is strictly prohibited.
2.2 User Responsibility:
The user agrees to use Clothy responsibly and to comply with:
- The technical conditions and limitations of the service.
- The applicable laws and regulations, including data protection, copyright, and e-commerce legislation.
- The terms and conditions of the websites from which data is extracted via web scraping (see section 3).
Improper or abusive use of the service may result in the immediate suspension or cancellation of the account.

section3.title: 3. FUNCTIONALITIES AND TECHNOLOGIES OF CLOTHY
section3.content:
3.1 Web Scraping and Third Parties:
Clothy incorporates a web scraping tool to obtain fashion information from various websites. The user acknowledges and agrees that:
 - They are solely responsible for initiating and managing web scraping queries.
 - They must comply with the policies, terms, and conditions of each website from which data is extracted.
 - Any non-compliance in the use of the extracted information will be the user's exclusive responsibility.

section4.title: 4. DATA PROTECTION AND PRIVACY
section4.content:
4.1 Regulatory Compliance:
Clothy is committed to protecting the privacy of its users and to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the Organic Law on Data Protection and Guarantee of Digital Rights (LOPDGDD), and other applicable regulations.
4.2 Data Processing:
The personal information you provide will be treated confidentially and used exclusively to improve the experience and quality of the service. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

section5.content:
5.1 Upload and Use of Images:

cookiespolicy.intro: On this page you will find all the information about the cookies used by Clothy, how they work and how you can manage them to comply with European regulations (ePrivacy Directive 2002/58/EC and GDPR – Regulation (EU) 2016/679).

section1.title: 1. What are cookies?
section1.text: Cookies are small text files that the browser stores on your device when you visit a website. They help facilitate and optimize your browsing experience, so the site “remembers” your session, preferences, and other data. Cookies generally do not contain direct personal data, but anonymous identifiers.

row1.description: Enable site navigation and basic functionality (authentication, keeping the session open).

row2.description: Collect anonymous information about site usage to improve it.

row3.description: Display personalized ads based on your interests.

section3.title: 3. Cookies we use
section3.item1: Authentication: store the encrypted JSON Web Token (JWT) that identifies your session.
section3.item2: Automatic login: so that once you have logged in, you do not have to re-enter your credentials until you log out.
section3.note: We do not use analytical, advertising, or third-party cookies.

section4.title: 4. Legal basis and purpose
section4.item1: Legal basis: Article 6.1.b of the GDPR (execution of a contract or user request).
section4.item2: Purpose: ensure the security and functionality of the authentication system, preventing you from having to log in again every time you use the search engine.

section5.title: 5. Managing and disabling cookies
section5.intro: You can disable or delete technical cookies from your browser, but this may affect proper session identification and maintenance. Below are links to guides for the most common browsers:

chrome.title: Google Chrome
chrome.step1: Menu ⋮ ▶ “Settings” ▶ “Privacy and security” ▶ “Cookies and other site data”.
chrome.step2: Manage or delete the cookies you want.

edge.title: Microsoft Edge
edge.step1: Menu … ▶ “Settings” ▶ “Privacy, search, and services” ▶ “Choose what to clear”.

section5.note: Remember that if you delete authentication cookies, you will be asked to log in again when you return to the site.

section6.title: 6. Updates and contact
section6.text:
We may modify this cookies policy due to legislative changes or site functionality. We recommend reviewing it periodically. For any questions or requests regarding privacy or cookies, you can contact us at:

Data Protection
